description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dr. Popper is a bubble breaker game. Pop matching groups, the bigger the group, the bigger the score. Five game modes each with their own challenges and high scores table. Try Extreme mode for huge pops and huge scores. Dr. Popper is kid friendly and very popular with kids age 5 and up.
